nodes.text: Orik's Spine was a location on the planet Corellia.

Orik's Spine was first mentioned in the new Star Wars canon in Star Wars: The Galactic Explorer's Guide, a 2019 reference book written by Jason Fry. Within the Star Wars Legends continuity, it was first mentioned in Suns of Fortune a 2014 roleplaying game sourcebook published by Fantasy Flight Games.
